job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Data Scientist</strong></p><p><strong>Location -California</strong></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Strong knowledge of Python and general software development skills (source code management, debugging, testing, deployment, etc.).</p><p>Strong understanding of text pre-processing and normalization techniques, such as tokenization, and POS tagging.</p><p>Ability to design NLP pipelines to meet customer requirements</p><p>Familiarity with different approaches for training entity tagging models (e.g. CRF, RNN, CNN, Transformer).</p><p>Experience with asynchronous programming is a plus.</p><p>Familiarity with deep learning frameworks such as Tensorflow and Pytorch a plus.</p><p>Familiarity with computer vision deep learning algorithms a plus (CNN, RCNN)</p><p>BS, MS and/or PhD in Mathematics, Physics, etc.</p><p>Interested candidates kindly mail their resume at career@kalongens.com</p>
